definitions.text: the act of beginning something new
examples: they looked forward to the debut of their new product line

definitions.text: the first section of a communication
formally making a person known to another or to the public
a basic or elementary instructional text

examples: they resisted the introduction of impractical alternatives

definitions.text: the act of putting one thing into another
the act of starting something for the first time; introducing something new
examples: she looked forward to her initiation as an adult
the foundation of a new scientific society
